result.arabic_text: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ
result.translation: Kandi ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye ni ibye mu birere no ku isi; (munamusingize) ku gicamunsi (igihe cy’iswala ya Al Aswir) n’igihe mugeze mu gihe cy’amanywa (igihe cy’iswala ya Adhuhur).[1]
result.footnotes: [1]-Ibun Abasi yavuze ko ibi ari byo bihe by’iswala eshanu z’itegeko byavuzwe muri Qur’an.
